description: Creates an Amazon Chime SDK Voice Connector group under the administrator's AWS account. You can associate Amazon Chime SDK Voice Connectors with the Voice Connector group by including VoiceConnectorItems in the request. You can include Voice Connectors from different AWS Regions in your group. This creates a fault tolerant mechanism for fallback in case of availability events.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the Voice Connector group.

parameters.name: VoiceConnectorItems
parameters.description: Lists the Voice Connectors that inbound calls are routed to. (dict) --- For Amazon Chime SDK Voice Connector groups, the Amazon Chime SDK Voice Connectors to which you route inbound calls. Includes priority configuration settings. Limit: 3 VoiceConnectorItems per Voice Connector group. The Voice Connector ID. The priority setting of a Voice Connector item. Calls are routed to hosts in priority order, with 1 as the highest priority. When hosts have equal priority, the system distributes calls among them based on their relative weight.

nested_params.name: Priority
nested_params.description: The priority setting of a Voice Connector item. Calls are routed to hosts in priority order, with 1 as the highest priority. When hosts have equal priority, the system distributes calls among them based on their relative weight.

nested_items.name: VoiceConnectorGroup
nested_items.description: The details of the Voice Connector group.

nested_items.name: VoiceConnectorGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of a Voice Connector group.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of a Voice Connector group.

nested_items.name: VoiceConnectorItems
nested_items.description: The Voice Connectors to which you route inbound calls.

nested_items.name: Priority
nested_items.description: The priority setting of a Voice Connector item. Calls are routed to hosts in priority order, with 1 as the highest priority. When hosts have equal priority, the system distributes calls among them based on their relative weight.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Voice Connector group's creation time stamp, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Voice Connector group's creation time stamp, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: VoiceConnectorGroupArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Voice Connector group.
